body:
1. The simulation has failed because of this fatal error:
** Fatal ** Program terminates due to previous condition. how could that be????? every example has the same problem. im gonna to die. please help me. thanks in advanced.

replies.body: I think your weather file (or epw file) has errors in it. Can you post your gh file and weather data file ?

thanks a lot!!

i think it is no the problem of epw file.
I have never gotten that error from E+ before.  Post the GH file and EPW file and I can check it out.
